subject: pleasant greeting to you and
body:
pleasant greeting to you and your family, I have tried all my possible
best to see that your ATM VISA CARD will be successfully airlifted and
safely delivered to your address by tomorrow as planned.Having
reviewed all the obstacles and problems to see that your ATM CARD is
insured as it was required to do by the Courier Company.
In line with this, I tried my best and raised $150 out of the $250.00
that was needed by the Courier Company for the  nsurance of your ATM
CARD. I did this since you have not been able to raise the $250.00
which is needed. Therefore, all you will now send is $100.00 only
nothing more. The Director of the Courier Company promised that he
will give you tracking information which you can use to monitor your
package while on transit till it finally gets to your address.
You should see this as a duty on your side to get the remaining
balance of $100.00 and send it to the Courier Company today. If you
are able to make this payment
immediately, your ATM CARD will be dispatched this evening as they
have promised to do. I assure you of this delivery and you will be
more than happy. Take note; On the parcel, you will find a brown
envelope sealed together inside the package, a secret code 4 digit
number that is the code you need to access the ATM CARD.
The amount credited on the card is $5.7 million dollars you can
withdraw $20,000 per day until the $5.7million dollars is fully paid
to you. Try and send the $100 now so that the Courier Company will
carry on your delivery this evening, you will receive an ATM CARD
tomorrow by 4:00pm. Make sure you give your full name and delivery
address to the  Courier Company to avoid delivery to the wrong address.
Please do this right away. They are waiting to dispatch your delivery
earlier today.
Once you send the $100.00 iTunes gift card or Amazon gift card you
should forward the payment cash receipts details to me for
acknowledgement, send the iTunes gift card or Amazon gift card to
Courier express delivery company.
Here is E-mail address to contact:
[Email( 
diplomaticurgent59@gmail.com
 )
Courier Agent: Mrs. Mary Randy.
I am giving you 100% guarantee, within 1 hour of time upon receipt of
the $100.00 from you, the ATM CARD will be dispatched for delivery to
your address and you will receive it tomorrow. As soon as you received
the ATM CARD, kindly get back to us to know about the successful
delivery to you okay.
The below your info is needed.
Your Full Name=============
Mobile Phone Number=====================
Current Home Address========
Age================
Country====================
State======================
Gender ==========
your email address------------
Thank you,
Mr.Bernard Jones
Email]edwedw72@yahoo.com]
Internal Auditor Foreign Transfer Unit.

subject: Re:   pleasant greeting to you and
body:
Hello Jones,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite exciting to hear about the ATM VISA CARD and its potential benefits. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring that it gets delivered safely.

I'm curious, though. How does this process work exactly? And why is there a need for me to send a gift card or an Amazon gift card? Could you please explain more about this?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned a secret code digit number. Is this something I should be aware of beforehand or will it be provided with the ATM CARD?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Naomi
